meta.title: From BEANS to OLIVES
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: I’m turning 49 this week. 49 is 7x7, so I’m celebrating with seven sets of seven: seven Raddles that go from the first to the seventh. Seven-layer dip is an appetizer that uses elements of Tex-Mex cuisine. The typical layers are refried beans, guacamole, sour cream, salsa, grated cheese, scallions and black olives, though there are many variations.

ladder.clue: {} <>, something obtained by having a cow?
Drop the first letter from <> and anagram to get the name of a science journal
{} <>, embodiment of the world around us
"<> of the {}", movie made in 1950, 1991, and 2022
Insert a letter in <> to get a span
Swap the first letter in <> with a bigram (two letters) to get a musical and movie
Change the last letter of <> to get some fruit
